title: This Anker 6-port charging station that we love is now $60 off
content:
Macworld

The Anker Prime charger is down to its best price for Black Friday. You can get it for $110 at Anker.com, a good 35 percent under its $170 MSRP — a total bargain.

This tiny charging station will look gorgeous on your desk, but it’s not just good looks that make it a good purchase, though. It features six super-fast ports and will charge anything, as we noted in our review, which gave it a near-perfect score and our Editors’ Choice award.

With a total output of 250W, this charging station features four USB-C ports and two USB-A ports. The first type-C port has a max of 140W, while the other three ports reach a maximum of 100W if used on their own. The USB-A ports can only reach a maximum of 22.5W.

While all of this is super cool, the best part is that you can personalize your charging experience. There’s a small control dial that allows you to adjust energy output to ensure each device gets the optimal speed. Your best bet is just going with the AI Power Mode, which automatically adjusts the power to match the needs of your device.

For $110, the Anker Prime is a great purchase as it cleans up your desk a bit and keeps everything you need fully charged at all times. So take advantage of this Black Friday deal while it’s still available.
